onStartDialogue.speaker: Tony
onStartDialogue.speech: Wow, I can't believe it's the final week already. How time flies...

onStartDialogue.speaker: Robert
onStartDialogue.speech: Yeah, I am so ready to get this over with. All those studying is making me feel old.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Tony
onStartDialogue.speech: You mean older than you already are eh?

onStartDialogue.speaker: Robert
onStartDialogue.speech: Wow Tony, I thought you are my friend.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Laura
onStartDialogue.speech: As much as I like this friendly banter, I have to remind you guys that the exam is starting in a few minutes.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Laura
onStartDialogue.speech: We cannot to afford to be complacent. Everything depends on this week. This is what decides whether we get our diploma.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Tony
onStartDialogue.speech: You know, for the first time in this semester. I think we really got this. With your healing skills, Robert's motivations, and my coding skills, I think we will pass with flying colors.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Robert
onStartDialogue.speech: Thanks for the word of encouragement Tony. I think we can be friends again now.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Tony
onStartDialogue.speech: Sweet. You know, maybe the real diploma is the friendship that we find along the way...

onStartDialogue.speaker: Laura
onStartDialogue.speech: Maybe it really is. Well, it's time for the exam guys. I hope you guys are ready to roll.
